title: Can anyone ID this font?
content:
Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you

 [‹ (x) Metropolitican Washington Airports Authority logo - Gill Sans {Geraint}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811190918/http:/typophile.com/node/19540 "Go to previous forum topic") [Vintage Taster's Choice label type? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811190918/http:/typophile.com/node/19523 "Go to next forum topic")
author: chrisg

comments.content: Try to add a new post with with the image to this thread.

Yves, have we ’improved’ the sytem here to the point where only people with the newest operating systems can post anything? Simpler is better for more people. _Please_ bring back a more generic, and User friendly way to incorporate images.

- Mike Yanega
I’ve notified the powers that be, and I hope they will look into it ASAP. This is beyond my sphere of influence, remember I am only the cleaning lady here.

_”...I am only the cleaning lady here.”_

I hardly think so, but at least you know the ’powers that be’.

Thanks.

- Mike Yanega (one very frustrated member)

Misc. image to see if i am having problems:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811190918im_/http:/typophile.com/files/whatdoyoudo_4006.gif)

Well, that worked. I noticed it automatically added an underscore and some numbers to the image. I guess that is to differentiate it from an similar file names. Maybe it is fixed?

I should’ve known my subterfuge wouldn’t work with you. :^D

I have once again notified our code master about this and a related image upload problem, and hope to hear from him soon. I’ll keep you posted.
